mapper.sql: select count(c.column_id) from board b inner join board_column c on b.board_id = c.board_id where b.board_name = #{boardName}
mapper.select: select c.column_id, c.column_name, c.column_index from board b inner join board_column c on b.board_id = c.board_id where b.board_name = #{boardName} order by c.column_index
mapper.insert: insert into board_column (board_id, column_name, column_index) select (), #{columnName}, () + 1
